snippet.title: Grimshade — trailer
snippet.description:
Add Grimshade to your wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/858100/Grimshade/

A story-driven tactical RPG featuring turn-based combat system and non-linear progression, set in a fantasy world.

Follow us:
Steam — https://store.steampowered.com/app/858100/Grimshade/
Website — grimshade.co.uk
Facebook — https://facebook.com/grimshadegame
VK — https://vk.com/grimshadegame
Discord — https://discord.gg/ttzqgH8
